rev.comment: updated info on number of downloads
rev.diff:
Line 206: Line 206:
The large number of users attempting to access the Mozilla website on June 17 caused it to become unavailable for at least a few hours and attempts at upgrading to the new version resulted in server timeouts.<ref>http://www.theregister.co.uk/2008/06/17/firefox_3_debuts/ Firefox 3 Download Day falls flat on face</ref><ref>[http://blog.mozilla.com/blog/2008/06/17/firefox-3-coming-soon/ The Mozilla Blog - Firefox 3 coming soon!] </ref> This problem has since been fixed and Firefox 3 is available for download from the Firefox website. <ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-10784_3-9970628-7.html?tag=blgs</ref>
The large number of users attempting to access the Mozilla website on June 17 caused it to become unavailable for at least a few hours and attempts at upgrading to the new version resulted in server timeouts.<ref>http://www.theregister.co.uk/2008/06/17/firefox_3_debuts/ Firefox 3 Download Day falls flat on face</ref><ref>[http://blog.mozilla.com/blog/2008/06/17/firefox-3-coming-soon/ The Mozilla Blog - Firefox 3 coming soon!] </ref> This problem has since been fixed and Firefox 3 is available for download from the Firefox website. <ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-10784_3-9970628-7.html?tag=blgs</ref>
â
As of 22:00 [[UTC]] on June 17th, Firefox 3 has been downloaded more than 1.65 million times<ref>http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord/</ref>. "Download Day" ends at 18:16 UTC on June 18th. <ref>http://blog.mozilla.com/blog/2008/06/17/download-day-is-here/</ref>
+
As of 22:00 [[UTC]] on June 17th, Firefox 3 has been downloaded more than 1.7 million times<ref>http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord/</ref>. "Download Day" ends at 18:16 UTC on June 18th. <ref>http://blog.mozilla.com/blog/2008/06/17/download-day-is-here/</ref>
